titles.title: Ballot Security Act of 1997

To amend the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to require individuals applying to register to vote in elections for Federal office to produce actual proof of citizenship and to permit States to require individuals to produce a photographic identification in order to vote in an election for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 03/20/1997--Introduced. Ballot Security Act of 1997 - Amends the National Voter Registration Act of 1993 to: (1) require actual proof of citizenship for persons applying to register to vote; and (2) authorize States to require voters to produce photographic identification.
